title: Where I can buy Google Pixel 3a in Cologne, Germany?
content: I want to get myself a new Google Pixel 3a, but I can't find it in Cologne stores.  I would have ordered delivery, but I am not from Germany and I want to issue a Tax Free refund for my purchase.  Can you tell me in which stores I can buy this phone?  I need to solve this problem in two days.
